features: ✔ PREMIUM BABY EYE CARE from Dr. Fischer brings to you the gentlest and most effective eyelid wipes that are absolutely free of preservatives, alcohol and other irritants. No more irritation of your baby's delicate eyes.

✔ TEAR FREE and RINSE FREE – Dr. Fischer Premium Baby Eyelid Wipes have been specially formulated with babies in mind. Clean away everyday dirt buildup around the eyes without crying or harmful chemicals and help alleviate clogged tear ducts and irritation.

✔ CONJUNCTIVITIS and CLOGGED TEAR DUCTS (along with pink eye, dry eye, styes & allergies) relief means easing eye irritation caused by these conditions is finally possible! Dr. Fischer Premium Baby Eyelid Wipes prevent the worsening of conditions, allowing your baby’s eyes to heal naturally.

✔ CLEANING YOUR BABY’S EYELASHES to get rid of oil, dirt, dust, crusted matter, ocular secretions, and other foreign bodies has never been easier. Just wipe & and clean with Dr. Fischer Premium Baby Eyelid Wipes.

✔ SAFE & EFFECTIVE FOR ALL AGE GROUPS - Dr. Fischer Premium Baby Eyelid Wipes have been recommended by Ophthalmologists, Pediatricians & Dermatologists for babies & kids of all ages. Embrace the safety of your baby's eyes.
body.description: Why use Dr. Fischer Premium Baby Eyelid Wipes? Children often wake up in the morning with red/itchy eyes, and sticky residue, crusted matter & scales on their eyelids and eyelashes. This can cause discomfort, interfere with vision and invite redness and itching. In these situations they may naturally rub their eyes with unclean hands and worsen the condition. Dr. Fischer Baby Eyelid Wipes allow you to easily clean the area, preventing worsening conditions. A great deal of research & testing have gone into the development of these eyelid wipes, in order to ensure their safety and effectiveness. Leading Ophthalmologists, Dermatologists and Pediatricians have endorsed Dr. Fischer Premium Baby Eyelid Wipes for babies & kids of all age groups. Easy to Use Dr. Fischer Premium Baby Eyelid Wipes are easy to use and rinse free. Being free of preservatives, fillers and alcohol, they are especially formulated for babies, as they are tear free, rinse-free and gentle on your baby eyelids and eyelashes. Making sure they wont cry and do not suffer from further irritation of their eyes! Cleansing of the highest order A child's daily environment in nursery schools, daycare centers and playgrounds frequently expose their delicate eye surrounds to dust, dirt, and allergens as well as serious contagious eye conditions. With Dr. Fischer Premium Baby Eyelid Wipes you can clean your child's eyelids and eyelashes of these irritants while helping prevent ocular conditions from worsening and assist the eyes in healing naturally.You can use these medically or daily, in combination with other options like eye drops/eye ointments to give your eyes the best chance of clearnessSay NO to harsh eye cleansers & start using 100% SAFE, TEAR FREE & IRRITATION FREE, Dr. Fischer Premium Baby Eyelid Wipes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have had super sensitive skin since I was a baby. As a result, I have to be very careful what products I try to use.Thankfully, most baby products are gentle enough for my skin, but even then, I still occasionally get a reaction.Luckily, these wipes have been super gentle and soothing on my skin and eyes!I never used to clean my eyes/lashes (I rarely ever wear makeup). But recently I got a nasty case of infectious Conjunctoblepharitis in my left eye. It took weeks and multiple antibiotics for the infection to finally clear.During those weeks of trying to fight the infection, I learned that I have Meibomian Gland Dysfunction (MGD).I now use these wipes (and warm compresses) religiously at least once and sometimes even twice a day. I love the refreshing feeling when I use them!I agree with other reviewers that the wipes are a tad big — especially for only one eye. I tend to cheat and will use half of the wipe on my right eye and the other half on my left. I know “technically” you should use a fresh wipe for each eye, but as these wipes are pretty costly, I have to be as economical as possible.I read reviews about cutting the wipes in half, but that too can introduce and spread germs on the wipe (from the scissors). For me, it feels safer to use just half of the whole wipe on first eye and simply flip/rotate the wipe to use the other half on the other eye. 🤷🏼‍♀️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle eye scrub pads
reviews.reviewText: The sheets r nice size for using on both eyes. Product is gentle n effective. I started using these before cataract surgery to make sure my eye lids were in good shape n clean. I will continue using them daily for healthy eye lids. I also use them on my Siamese cat’s eyes which help eliminate the build up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easily wipes away eye gunk with the ease of safety!
reviews.reviewText: Our newborn baby girl had a clogged duct and we needed something that was safe enough to wisp away those funky eyes without making things worse. These definitely did the trick! A+++

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best eye wipes for kids and adults
reviews.reviewText: These are exactly what my elder father was looking for. All the others ones you had to use and wash off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very gentle on the eyes
reviews.reviewText: I use the product to clean eyelids at night. Other wipes have been too harsh for eyelids. This product is very mild and works great. I just visited my eye doctor and these wipes are working well! I originally ordered the two pack and only received a one pack. Dr. Fischer's customer service exceeded my expectation and sent out the missing product the next day. Thank you for the exemplary customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for baby eye gunk!
reviews.reviewText: My baby has had a few eye infections from daycare, and these really help with removing the crusty gunk after she’s been asleep. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product after fixing latest shipment issues
reviews.reviewText: We have been purchasing this product for quite a while, but last shipment was 1) one pack instead of two and 2) that pack had been opened. Contacted Amazon Returns and the the item was replaced in two days, with credit received for the return shipment shortly afterwards. A bit of a problem this time but quickly and satisfactorily resolved. The product is a little spendy, but it's what our ophthalmologist recommends and it works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazingly soft eye wipes
reviews.reviewText: I used it for my baby’s eyelids that often caked up. Great product!

reviews.reviewTitle: Helped cure my newborn's eye problem
reviews.reviewText: My baby had blocked tear duct, and I was very worried about using any products on her eyes. I trusted Dr. Fischer wipes, and after some time of using them, by baby's eyes are fine. The wipes never irritated her eyes. The wipes are large enough that I could actually tear each in two and use each packet two times. the wipes are moist enough, but not too wet. I bout these wipes 4 times and will buy again, if needed.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ces lingettes sont très chères mais ont de nombreuses qualités.
reviews.reviewText: Je ne peux plus prendre de douches ni faire une "toilette de chat"...l'infirmière s'en sert pour me laver.Ça revient très cher mais c'est super.

Très bonne lingettes, grandes et de qualité, je fais beaucoup de blépharites et ces lingettes m’ont grandement aidé à les contrôler.Le seul point négatif, j’ai reçu une seule boîte, et c’est très difficile de rejoindre quelqu’un du service à la clientèle et leur expliquer mon problème, je ne veux pas de remboursement, je veux seulement mon autre boîte.
The media could not be loaded. Came only 1 not a twin pack , and damaged . To expansive for 1 .Returningthe item .
